info.author: Jorge Javier Araya Navarro
info.description:
Kense is a Selenium helper for Kendo UI widgets |pipeline status| |coverage report| |Documentation Status| |PyPI| |PyPI - License| |PyPI - Wheel| |PyPI - Python Version| |Kendo UI versions supported| |LinkedIn|
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Remove boilerplate code and free yourself from false positives or bugs
in your frontend tests!.

The project’s name comes from merging the first characters of ‘Kendo’
and ‘Selenium’. Born out of frustrations I experienced working with
Kendo UI and testing during the last full-time project I worked on. With
this set of helpers you can write integration tests quickly and
painlessly.

Kense is tested against different versions of Kendo UI to ensure it
works as expected, always.

info.name: kense
info.summary: Selenium helpers for dealing with Kendo UI widgets
info.html_description:
Remove boilerplate code and free yourself from false positives or bugs in your frontend tests!.

The project’s name comes from merging the first characters of ‘Kendo’ and ‘Selenium’. Born out of frustrations I experienced working with Kendo UI and testing during the last full-time project I worked on. With this set of helpers you can write integration tests quickly and painlessly.

Kense is tested against different versions of Kendo UI to ensure it works as expected, always.
